definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Sir Isaac Newton (1642-1727), British mathematician and physicist

sentences.english: "Appeared the same night," the night on which he went to Beer-sheba.
sentences.chinese: 艾薩克上別示巴去，當夜耶和華向他顯現。

sentences.english: "They didn't beat us", said Max Isaacs.
sentences.chinese: “他們並未打垮我們，”麥克司，艾薩克斯說。

sentences.english: Both of them mocked Isaac that he was a parasite on his parents .
sentences.chinese: 他們兩一起嘲笑艾薩克說他是他父母的寄生蟲。

sentences.english: Isaac and Daniel joked about this throughout the trip.
sentences.chinese: 一路上，艾薩克和丹尼爾都以此開玩笑。

sentences.english: In the past he has pooh-poohed suggestions that he might succeed Isaacs.
sentences.chinese: 過去他對自己會接替艾薩克斯之說嗤之以鼻。

sentences.english: Every morning , she let Isaac read a paragraph from an article in the class.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上，她讓艾薩克上課時讀一段文章。

sentences.english: His favorites included Arthur C.Clarke and Isaac Asimov.
sentences.chinese: 他最喜歡的作家有阿瑟克拉克以及艾薩克阿西莫夫。
